# Automated Shoutout Script

This script is designed to provide automated shoutouts in two specific scenarios: when someone raids your channel and when someone special (from a predefined list) appears in your chat. All potential conflicts are covered by the script unless someone intervenes into the flow (e.g. by sending a Twitch-native shoutout before the bot did).

## Features

### When someone raids your channel

1. Triggers a Twitch-native shoutout to acknowledge the raider
2. Sends a personalized welcome message that is read aloud using Text-to-Speech (TTS) with [VTS POG](https://eruben.itch.io/vts-pog) using the linked model
3. Also send a chat shoutout

You can personalize the message on your own. This script requires VTS POG v2 and enabling API in the application.

### When someone from the list appears

1. Triggers a chat SO using an external bot (to increase the immersion of my bot)

You need to set up the `SO` group in Streamer.bot (Settings -> Groups). Remember to put there people you want to SO! The external bot must support `!so` command or any other command for this purpose (your choice).


## Installation

1. Open Streamer.bot
2. Click Import
3. Copy-paste the string below:
```text

```
4. Enjoy :)
